评论详情: This is very cute and perfect for summer! It would be a great top to wear over a bathing suit. It is see-through, so I recommend wearing a sticky or strapless bra.

评论概述: not very cute and not comfortable
评论详情: I do not like the look of this top it is not cute and the material is super itchy. the top is irregularly short and does not fit right on my body. i hate the scrunches on the sides of the top they ride up making the top just look weird from the sides.

This top is adorable, I’m so obsessed with the pattern! The material is great and very comfortable and soft. Even in winter this can be worn with a cute jacket and pull together any outfit perfectly!! I will be buying this in more colors!

This is so cute but way to big on my small frame. I have to pin it in the back if I want to wear it. Definitely order a size down. Wish they had an XS or even XXS. Material feels nice and the length is nice but bust and overall fit is just too big.

I ordered this shirt in a size small, for reference I am 5’3 120lbs, and it fits perfectly! The quality is super nice and lightweight, perfect for summer and just being comfortable. The colors are so so pretty, I definitely recommend!!💗
I normally wear a size M, and I bought a size M. It is a little tight, which is perfect for a tube top so it doesn't fall down! It looks super cute and is comfy. I can't wait to wear it out!
